name: Tap Those Targets
description:
Can you tap them all? Casual target gallery!

Click as many targets as you can, but don't miss or you'll lose a life!

THREE WAYS TO PLAY:
Normal - Three lives, it gets tougher and tougher!
One Life - One life, shrinking targets, how many can you click?
Fast Fingers - Click as many times as you can in ten seconds!
